pullRequest.title: Do not reference units by ID if an object reference will do
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is a follow-on to #2137 to keep things manageable. Basically, this furthers the goal of using object references to refer to objects (one of the selling points of OOP).
I'm still fleshing out unit tests for areas that are testable, but this comes with tests for units+persons.

commit.message: Use Units rather than their IDs
Do not use Unit IDs in Refits
Add test coverage for person+unit related methods
Add more tests for a person based on their unit

Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: Justin Bowen <39067288+Windchild292@users.noreply.github.com>
Add tests for transport unit sets
